topic.title: Enroll a User from This Site in This Conference
topic.section: By selecting The Enroll a User from This Site in This Conference link from the Conference Site Management page, the Conference Manager will see a list of all users registered with the system, and will be able to search against the user list, or jump around by letter of the alphabet. The Conference Manager can enroll multiple users at a time by checking the box next to their user name, selecting a user role from the drop-down menu, and clicking the Enroll Selected Users button.
